**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 27 **Prerequisites** [armor](/Innovations.aspx?ID=1), [construct](/Innovations.aspx?ID=2), or [weapon](/Innovations.aspx?ID=3) innovation **Trigger** Your turn begins. --- You can use unstable clockwork devices in your innovation to push your invention to act more quickly. You are [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for this turn. How you can use the extra action depends on your innovation.
  • **Armor** You can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or use another movement action granted by your innovation (such as Swim if you have the [Diving Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=3056) feat).
  • **Construct** You can use the extra action to Command your construct innovation (or to provide 1 of the actions if you spend 2 actions to Command your construct).
  • **Weapon** You can use the extra action to Strike with your innovation or Reload your innovation.
name: Clockwork Celerity
